turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu güzel sanat sergisini denemeseysin çok pişman olursun.
english_example_sentence: If you were not to try this beautiful art exhibition, you would regret it.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не попробовал эту красивую художественную выставку, ты бы пожалел.
